boat.full_description:
'Zoe', launched in 2016, is constructed of Alaskan yellow cedar on Khyaya plywood/laminated frames with a Gaboon plywood deck and cabin top. The hull and decks are sheathed in epoxy and glass and the cockpit has laid teak seats and all the trip is in teak. The spars are Sitka spruce and the gaff is curved. She has a long shallow box keel that houses the internal lead ballast and a lead ballasted pivoting centre plate.

The outboard engine sits in a well and is pivoted up and out of the water when sailing.
boat.name: Zoe
boat.short_description: 'Zoe' is a home built trailer sailer, launched in July 2016 at Mylor.
